mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence from G.M. Wells
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, May 11, 1862, from G. (George) M. Wells, Private Co. A. 24th VA Infantry at Chicahomina River, New Kent Co, Va. Subject: state of the company and other news of the war from his place. Also details of previous daysâ€™ fighting. 1 original piece.
